item.title: GROUNDIES® Nova GO1 Women
item.description: Barefoot sneaker Nova GO1Our Nova barefoot sneaker is one of our classics and has now also been developed with the popular GO1 sole. The material mix of high-quality nubuck and cowhide leather as well as the breathable OnSteam® lining made of microfiber make our Nova GO1 a versatile barefoot sneaker. Look forward to a successful mix of colors and materials, a natural barefoot feeling and plenty of space in the toe box thanks to the anatomical toe box.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Universe Men
item.description: Same same but different: This new Universe comes with new leather and feels even better! Everything else remains uncompromisingly revolutionary: Natural foot freedom and casual street style have never been so flawlessly united. Sharp edges and soft leather turn every outfit into a statement. The completely new, innovative TrueSense® GS1 sole is only 6.9 mm thick, flexible, and durable. It gives you a feeling like barefoot and protects your feet as in a traditional shoe.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Milano Men
item.description: Simply classic: Our Milano is an elegant, ankle-high leather lace-up that adds style to almost any wardrobe. You can look forward to a wonderful barefoot feeling and plenty of space in the toe area thanks to the anatomical toe box.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Kos Men
item.description: Our Kos is a modern and simple men\'s barefoot sandal, which definitely passes as a unisex model and can thus also be worn by women. The high-quality leather provides a simple and elegant look, the thin and flexible sole, on the other hand, lets you walk noticeably on the ground. Stable support is provided by the slingback strap as well as the wide strap over the foot.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Kos Women
item.description: Our Kos is a modern and simple barefoot sandal, which definitely passes as a unisex model and can thus also be worn by women. item.title: GROUNDIES® Palermo Men
item.description: Our Palermo is a versatile and classic barefoot shoe that lets you combine both chic and sporty. The lace-up made of high-quality leather and a breathable microfiber OnSteam® lining provides a natural barefoot feeling in combination with the thin and flexible sole. With an appearance that\'s reduced to the essentials, here you will find a daily all-rounder for many different occasions. Thanks to the anatomical toe box, your toes have plenty of space for movement.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Palermo Barefoot + Men
item.description: The Palermo Barefoot+ is a versatile and classic barefoot shoe that offers a look that is both chic and sporty.. The lace-up shoe made of high-quality leather with a breathable microfiber OnSteam® lining works in combination with the thin and flexible sole to provide a natural barefoot feel. Featuring a simple, minimalistic design, this shoe is an everyday all-rounder for a wide variety of occasions.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Verona Women
item.description: Want a super soft barefoot feeling? Then our barefoot sandal Verona is just right for you. The high-quality leather sandal has a soft inner padding, an elastic heel strap and plenty of toe room. The crossed straps turn the otherwise plain summer sandal into a fashionable companion that subtly spices up your summer wardrobe. The thin and flexible barefoot sole makes a noticeable difference.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Milano Barefoot + Men
item.description: Simply classic in Barefoot +: Our Milano is an elegant, ankle-high leather lace-up that adds style to almost any wardrobe. The high-quality leather upper and breathable OnSteam® microfiber inner lining make this barefoot shoe a rugged yet comfortable companion. You can look forward to a wonderful barefoot feeling and plenty of space in the toe area thanks to the wide toe box. Available as a women\'s model in black and as a men\'s model in black and brown.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Universe Kids
item.description: Introducing: Our popular classic, Universe, now available as a children\'s shoe. From now on, even the little ones can enjoy healthy barefoot walking without having to sacrifice a cool sneaker look. The comfortable barefoot shoe for kids provides comfortable barefoot pleasure thanks to its simple Velcro closure, easy entry with a heel loop, and child-friendly left and right labeling on the sole. At the same time, the thin and flexible sole trains the foot muscles from the first steps. The anatomical toe box provides a foot-friendly, wider fit in the toe area, while the breathable OnSteam® lining made of microfiber ensures a healthy foot climate.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Active Knit Women
item.description: The Groundies Active Knit is aptly named. This barefoot sports shoe is perfect for all active individuals who love to walk barefoot. Thanks to its woven material, it fits like a sock, is highly breathable, light, and flexible. The result: a top look and 100% comfort all day long.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Amsterdam Barefoot+ Women
item.description: Our summer classic among the Groundies barefoot shoes is now also available in Barefoot+: Our Amsterdam is light and airy, can be combined in a variety of ways and, thanks to its wide toe box, provides extra space and freedom of movement in the toe area. The casual sneaker is made of robust yet supple goatskin leather and breathable OnSteam® lining made of microfiber. item.title: GROUNDIES® Galaxy Men
item.description: This stylish premium barefoot sneaker comes in four color variants right off the bat! Ultra-flexible, versatile, and equipped with an anatomical toe box, so your toes can enjoy ample space and mobility. Good looks, yes, but no compromises on quality: The casual sneaker is made of high-quality leather and breathable OnSteam® microfiber lining. The original TrueSense® GS4 barefoot sole is flat, thin, yet provides enough grip. This way, you enjoy freedom of movement and direct contact with the ground with every step.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Lima Women
item.description: A redefined urban classic! Our Groundies® Barefoot Sneaker Lima is the successor to our popular Brooklyn Low and for everyone looking for an uncomplicated all-rounder, but do not want to forego sustainability. This vegan unisex barefoot sneaker has been sustainably manufactured and ensures pleasant air circulation thanks to its breathable lining made from 100% organic cotton and an insole made from OnSteam® microfiber. The thin and flexible sole creates a noticeably light barefoot feeling, while the anatomical toe box provides enough space in the toe area.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Lou Kids
item.description: Our Groundies® Kids\' Barefoot Shoe Lou has the potential to become a best buddy. Made of high-quality goat leather and robust mesh inserts, this children\'s shoe impresses not just with its simple and cool look, but also thanks to its thin and flexible sole, it\'s exceptionally comfortable. The child-friendly marking of left and right on the outsole and the easy Velcro fastener ensure effortless putting on and taking off. Breathable lining made of OnSteam® microfiber ensures a healthy foot climate from the first steps, while the anatomical toe box allows for a foot-friendly, wider fit in the toe area. Sustainable plus: The recycled rubber sole.

item.title: GROUNDIES® All Terrain High 2.0 Women
item.description: The Groundies All Terrain High is the ideal hiking shoe for outdoor adventures. With the revised GH2 TrueSense® hiking sole, it offers optimal grip, a wider toe box, and improved comfort. Its upper material made of recycled polyester is waterproof and breathable, while the soft ankle padding ensures pleasant comfort even on long tours. Stability and support are provided by the thoughtful lacing zones at the instep. The All Terrain High combines the benefits of a barefoot shoe with the robustness required by challenging terrain a must-have for outdoor enthusiasts.

The vegan upper material made from recycled polyester is waterproof and breathable. This barefoot shoe is the perfect companion for outdoor adventures where comfort and functionality are the focus.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Lima Women
item.description: A redefined urban classic! Our Groundies® Barefoot Sneaker Lima is the successor to our popular Brooklyn Low and for everyone looking for an uncomplicated all-rounder, but do not want to forego sustainability. This vegan unisex barefoot sneaker has been sustainably manufactured and ensures pleasant air circulation thanks to its breathable lining made from 100% organic cotton and an insole made from OnSteam® microfiber. The thin and flexible sole creates a noticeably light barefoot feeling, while the anatomical toe box provides enough space in the toe area.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Odessa GX2 Women
item.description: Winter-ready with wool fleece & barefoot comfort.The Odessa ankle boot combines minimalist style with elaborated function. item.description: Just slip them on, close the velcro and off you go. Malmö encourages your kids\' independence at putting on shoes and helps to achieve their first success stories. The design with contrasting colours gives a subtle twist to the look.The soft suede, combined with a fit guided by the natural shape of feet, provides the perfect comfort. The ultra-thin sole with an only 2 mm base offers maximum flexibility and ease, which kids need for daily exploring and fun.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Lund Kids
item.description: Lund. Natural, flexible, healthy. Lund combines the classic design of a chelsea boot with the natural comfort that supports a healthy development of feet. The TrueSense® GK 3 Kids sole with a 2 mm base and only 1,5 mm profile provides maximum flexibility and encourages a natural rolling off the foot with every step. The soft suede makes it weather-resistant and offers pleasant comfort. All day. With its modest design the boot is versatilely styled and a reliable companion, even during unsettled weather.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Ottawa Kids
item.description: Ottawa Kids. The waterproof winter boot for warm feet and lots of freedom to move. The Ottawa winter boot offers everything kids need during the cold season: warm, dry feet, maximum flexibility for movement and anti-slip security. The TrueSense® GK 3 Kids sole with 10 % recycled rubber provides comfort and flexibility with every step. The upper material made of recycled PES-Mesh protects small feet from the wet and cold. Applications made of synthetic PU leather in the heel and toe area prevent abrasions. Synthetic wool as inner lining and the high boot leg also keep the ankles warm. The velcro fastener offers a secure fit and is easy to put on and off. The ideal winter companion that impresses with functionality, comfort and an anatomical fit.

The smooth, seamless knit material feels light and prevents pressure points and blisters. The Motion sole made of recycled rubber offers you the grip and flexibility you need when exercising.Whether you\'re at the gym, training or relaxing after a workout, the G-Pure provides you with comfort and freedom on active days.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Adelaide Women
item.description: Adelaide. Distinct look, light feel.The Adelaide ankle boot with lacing made of high-quality nubuck leather combines robust stability with a clear, slim silhouette. The U-seam on the instep gives the boot individual character. The zipper on the inner side with a metal handle makes for an effortless putting on and taking off.Distinct look, flexible movement: the supple Urban Classic sole comes with a visual heel. Golden loops for the laces complete the design clean, modern & ready for urban life.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Sienna Women
item.description: Sienna. The ankle boot with exclusive croco-look. Sienna made of nubuck leather with fine croco embossing combines classic elegance with a modern twist. The unique design makes it a real statement piece that is brilliant for everyday life as well as for special events. The TrueSense® GS1 sole provides the needed comfort and maximum flexibility, while the rubber edge protects the shoe from moisture and abrasion.This versatile ankle boot adapts perfectly to your foot. The combination of high-quality nubuck leather, the textured croco embossing and the minimalist silhouette makes Sienna a timeless classic with a modern update. For comfort and style that lasts all day.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Trento Women
item.description: Trento. Classic, clean, anatomical.Trento with laces combines elegant smooth leather & urban minimalism. The Urban Classic sole with a visual heel provides a classic loafer look & offers maximum flexibility as well as anatomical freedom at the same time. The Barefoot Fit gives your toes space to move naturally. The onSteam® inner lining provides a pleasant foot climate.This is how the Trento loafer effortlessly accompanies you from business meetings to elegant events: clean, comfortable, ready-to-wear.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Tucson Women
item.description: Tucson: western boots meet urban lifestyle.The Tucson is a mid-calf boot that combines the classic cowboy shape with a clean minimalist look. The mid-height shaft with zipper and pull strap on the side facilitate easy access, while the TrueSense® Urban Classic sole with visual wedge offers flexibility and a firm grip. Cowhide suede and the breathable textile lining provide comfort, while the Barefoot Fit enables natural movement.Simple, elegant, made for daily life: perfect for city looks, leisure or colder days.

item.title: GROUNDIES® Phoenix 2.0 Women
item.description: Distinct look. Clear statement.The Phoenix 2.0 biker boot combines urban aesthetics with natural comfort. The upper material made of nappa leather meets distinct leather straps with a metal ring and a convenient zipper. The new GX2 sole made of anti-slip rubber provides firm grip and winter-isolation, while the Barefoot Fit offers natural freedom to move and the light micro-fleece lining keeps you pleasantly warm.Perfect for bold business-casual looks or modern statement outfits that deliberately create contrasts between eye-catching and professional. Wear the Phoenix 2.0 with clean trousers, midi-skirts or oversized blazers for a confident, urban look.
